About Me

I love coding and anime. For one of my hobbies, I like to play fighting games and compete in fighting game tournaments. My love for technology and passion to always continue learning has developed into a passion for software development. I hope to one day have a job as a software developer and be able to support myself financially so that I may quit my retail job and get my own apartment.
